alert.note: Alert for Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 9:05PM EST until March 04 at 12:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate snow will diminish through 1030 pm EST before ending. Less that an inch additional accumulation possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until midnight EST /11 PM CST/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel on untreated roads will remain very difficult. Gusty winds may bring down tree branches and lead to additional power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
